reviews.review_msg: give her a raise. Heather is awesome and is flexible with your needs. Truly here to teach and make sure we understand content. She connects well with students and just wants the best for us. She's so smart and knows exactly what to say all the time. Gives great examples and explanations.

Take every class you can with Heather! The sweetest prof I have ever had and you can tell she cares about her students. 282W is a writing intensive course so there was a lot of material but Heather was always encouraging us to ask for help and truly wanted us to do well.
